page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content:
{A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A BICKER CHILD
Claire, a first year at Cowley's secondary school in Donington, starts her day at 5.00 am by helping her dad hoe his field of sugar beet.After breakfast she has to travel 2 miles into school on the school bus. At school she meets her friends and joins the rest of the 560 pupils.
After registration the first lesson is French followed by Geography and Science.Soon it is lunch and time for chips and a stroll round school before English and RE.
At home in the evening she watches a video and plays tennis before getting ready for bed.
